item.text: This is what Moses said to all of Israel in the Transjordanian wilderness, the arid rift valley opposite Suph, between Paran and Tophel, Laban, Hazeroth, and Di Zahab.

Now it is ordinarily an <st data-num="0259 06240">eleven</st>-<st data-num="03117" class="">day</st> journey<n id="1" /> from <st data-num="02722" class="">Horeb</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="05704" class="">to</st> <st data-num="06947" class="">Kadesh Barnea</st><n id="3" /> by <st data-num="01870" class="">way</st> of <st data-num="02022" class="">Mount</st> <st data-num="08165" class="">Seir</st>.<n id="4" />
However, it was not until the first day of the eleventh month of the fortieth year that Moses addressed the Israelites just as the Lord had instructed him to do.

This took place <st data-num="0310" class="">after</st> the <st data-num="05221" class="">defeat</st><n id="1" /> of <st data-num="04428" class="">King</st> <st data-num="05511" class="">Sihon</st><n id="2" /> of the <st data-num="0567" class="">Amorites</st>, <st data-num="0834" class="">whose</st> <st data-num="03427" class="">capital</st> was<n id="3" /> in <st data-num="02809" class="">Heshbon</st>,<n id="4" /> and <st data-num="04428" class="">King</st> <st data-num="05747" class="">Og</st> of <st data-num="01316" class="">Bashan</st>, <st data-num="0834" class="">whose</st> <st data-num="03427" class="">capital</st> was<n id="5" /> in <st data-num="06252" class="">Ashtaroth</st>,<n id="6" /> specifically in <st data-num="0154" class="">Edrei</st>.<n id="7" />
So it was in the Transjordan, in Moab, that Moses began to deliver these words:
The Lord our God spoke to us at Horeb and said, “You have stayed in the area of this mountain long enough.

<st data-num="06437" class="">Head out</st><n id="1" /> and <st data-num="05265" class="">resume</st> your <st data-num="05265" class="">journey</st>. <st data-num="0935" class="">Enter</st> the <st data-num="0567" class="">Amorite</st> <st data-num="02022" class="">hill country</st>, and <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> its <st data-num="07934" class="">neighboring areas</st>, including the <st data-num="06160" class="">rift valley</st>,<n id="2" /> the <st data-num="02022" class="">hill country</st>, the <st data-num="08219" class="">foothills</st>,<n id="3" /> the <st data-num="05045" class="">Negev</st>,<n id="4" /> and the <st data-num="03220" class="">coastal</st> <st data-num="03220" class="">plain</st>—<st data-num="0776" class="">all</st> of <st data-num="03669" class="">Canaan</st> and <st data-num="03844" class="">Lebanon</st> <st data-num="05704" class="">as far as</st> the <st data-num="01419" class="">Great</st> <st data-num="05104" class="">River</st>, that is, the <st data-num="05104 06578">Euphrates</st>.
Look! I have already given the land to you. Go, occupy the territory that I, the Lord, promised to give to your ancestors Abraham, Isaac, and Jacob, and to their descendants.”

I also <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> you at <st data-num="01931" class="">that</st> <st data-num="06256" class="">time</st>, “I am <st data-num="03808" class="">no</st> longer <st data-num="03201" class="">able</st> to <st data-num="05275" class="">sustain</st> you <st data-num="0905" class="">by</st> myself.
The Lord your God has increased your population to the point that you are now as numerous as the very stars of the sky.
Indeed, may the Lord, the God of your ancestors, make you a thousand times more numerous than you are now, blessing you just as he said he would!

But <st data-num="0349" class="">how</st> can I <st data-num="0905" class="">alone</st> <st data-num="05375" class="">bear</st> up under the <st data-num="02960" class="">burden</st> of your <st data-num="04853" class="">hardship</st> and <st data-num="07379" class="">strife</st>?

<st data-num="03051" class="">Select</st> <st data-num="02450" class="">wise</st> and <st data-num="0995" class="">practical</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="0582" class="">men</st>, those <st data-num="03045" class="">known</st> among your <st data-num="07626" class="">tribes</st>, whom I may <st data-num="07760" class="">appoint</st> as your <st data-num="07218" class="">leaders</st>.”
You <st data-num="06030" class="">replied</st> to me that <st data-num="01697 0834">what</st> I had <st data-num="01696" class="">said</st> to you was <st data-num="02896" class="">good</st>.

So I <st data-num="03947" class="">chose</st><n id="1" /> as your <st data-num="07626" class="">tribal</st> <st data-num="07218" class="">leaders</st> <st data-num="02450" class="">wise</st> and <st data-num="03045" class="">well-known</st> <st data-num="0376" class="">men</st>, <st data-num="05414" class="">placing</st> them <st data-num="05921" class="">over</st> you as <st data-num="08269" class="">administrators</st> of groups of <st data-num="0505" class="">thousands</st>, <st data-num="03967" class="">hundreds</st>, <st data-num="02572" class="">fifties</st>, and <st data-num="06235" class="">tens</st>, and also as other <st data-num="07626" class="">tribal</st> <st data-num="07860" class="">officials</st>.

I furthermore <st data-num="06680" class="">admonished</st> your <st data-num="08199" class="">judges</st> at <st data-num="01931" class="">that</st> <st data-num="06256" class="">time</st> that they<n id="1" /> should <st data-num="08085">pay attention to issues</st> <st data-num="0996" class="">among</st> your <st data-num="0251" class="">fellow citizens</st><n id="2" /> and <st data-num="08199" class="">judge</st> <st data-num="06664" class="">fairly</st>,<n id="3" /> whether <st data-num="0996" class="">between</st> <st data-num="0376" class="">one person</st> <st data-num="0996" class="">and</st> a <st data-num="0251" class="">native Israelite</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="0996" class="">or</st> a <st data-num="01616" class="">resident foreigner</st>.<n id="5" />

They must not discriminate in judgment, but hear the lowly and the great alike. Nor should they be intimidated by human beings, for judgment belongs to God. If the matter being adjudicated is too difficult for them, they should bring it before me for a hearing.
So I instructed you at that time regarding everything you should do.

Then we left Horeb and passed through all that immense, forbidding wilderness that you saw on the way to the Amorite hill country as the Lord our God had commanded us to do, finally arriving at Kadesh Barnea.
Then I said to you, “You have come to the Amorite hill country, which the Lord our God is about to give us.
Look, he has placed the land in front of you! Go up, take possession of it, just as the Lord, the God of your ancestors, said to do. Do not be afraid or discouraged!”

So <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> of you <st data-num="07126" class="">approached</st> me and <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st>, “Let’s <st data-num="07971" class="">send</st> some <st data-num="0376" class="">men</st> <st data-num="06440" class="">ahead of</st> us to <st data-num="02658" class="">scout out</st> the <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st> and <st data-num="07725" class="">bring</st> us <st data-num="07725" class="">back</st> <st data-num="01697" class="">word</st> as to <st data-num="01870 0834">how</st> we should <st data-num="05927" class="">attack</st> it and what the <st data-num="05892" class="">cities</st> are like <st data-num="0834 0935 0413">there</st>.”

I <st data-num="05869" class="">thought</st> <st data-num="01697" class="">this</st> was a <st data-num="03190" class="">good</st> <st data-num="01697" class="">idea</st>,<n id="1" /> so I <st data-num="03947" class="">sent</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="08147 06240">twelve</st> <st data-num="0582" class="">men</st> <st data-num="04480" class="">from among</st> you, <st data-num="0376 0259">one</st> from each <st data-num="07626" class="">tribe</st>.

They <st data-num="06437" class="">left</st> and <st data-num="05927" class="">went up</st> to the <st data-num="02022" class="">hill country</st>, <st data-num="0935" class="">coming</st> <st data-num="05704" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="0812" class="">Eshcol</st> <st data-num="05158" class="">Valley</st>,<n id="1" /> which they <st data-num="07270" class="">scouted out</st>.
Then they took some of the produce of the land and carried it back down to us. They also brought a report to us, saying, “The land that the Lord our God is about to give us is good.”
You were not willing to go up, however, but instead rebelled against the Lord your God.
You complained among yourselves privately and said, “Because the Lord hates us he brought us from Egypt to deliver us over to the Amorites so they could destroy us!

<st data-num="0575" class="">What</st> is <st data-num="05927" class="">going to happen</st> to <st data-num="0587" class="">us</st>? Our <st data-num="0251" class="">brothers</st> have <st data-num="04549" class="">drained away</st> our <st data-num="03824" class="">courage</st><n id="1" /> by <st data-num="0559" class="">describing</st> <st data-num="05971" class="">people</st> who are <st data-num="04480" class="">more</st> <st data-num="01419" class="">numerous</st><n id="2" /> and <st data-num="07311" class="">taller</st> <st data-num="04480" class="">than</st> we are, and <st data-num="01419" class="">great</st> <st data-num="05892" class="">cities</st> whose <st data-num="01219" class="">defenses</st> appear to be as high as <st data-num="08064" class="">heaven</st><n id="3" /> itself! <st data-num="01571" class="">Moreover</st>, they said they <st data-num="07200" class="">saw</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="01121 06062">Anakites</st><n id="5" /> <st data-num="08033" class="">there</st>.”

So I <st data-num="0559" class="">responded</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> you, “Do <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> be <st data-num="06206 03808 03372">terrified</st><n id="1" /> of <st data-num="01992" class="">them</st>!
The Lord your God is about to go ahead of you; he will fight for you, just as you saw him do in Egypt

and in the <st data-num="04057" class="">wilderness</st>, <st data-num="0834" class="">where</st> you <st data-num="07200" class="">saw</st> <st data-num="03068 0430">him</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="05375" class="">carrying</st> you along <st data-num="0834" class="">like</st> a <st data-num="0376" class="">man</st> <st data-num="05375" class="">carries</st> his <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st>. This he did <st data-num="03605 01870 0834">everywhere</st> you <st data-num="01980" class="">went</st> <st data-num="05704" class="">until</st> you <st data-num="0935" class="">came</st> <st data-num="05704" class="">to</st> <st data-num="02088" class="">this</st> very <st data-num="04725" class="">place</st>.”
However, through all this you did not have confidence in the Lord your God,
who would go before you on the way to find places for you to camp, appearing in a fire at night and in a cloud by day to show you the way you ought to go.
When the Lord heard you, he became angry and made this vow:

“<st data-num="0518" class="">Not</st> a <st data-num="0376" class="">single</st> <st data-num="0376 0428">person</st><n id="1" /> of <st data-num="02088" class="">this</st> <st data-num="07451" class="">evil</st> <st data-num="01755" class="">generation</st> will <st data-num="07200" class="">see</st> the <st data-num="02896" class="">good</st> <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">that</st> I <st data-num="07650" class="">promised</st> to <st data-num="05414" class="">give</st> to your <st data-num="01" class="">ancestors</st>!

The <st data-num="02108" class="">exception</st> is <st data-num="03612" class="">Caleb</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="03312" class="">Jephunneh</st>;<n id="1" /> <st data-num="01931" class="">he</st> will <st data-num="07200" class="">see</st> it and I will <st data-num="05414" class="">give</st> him and his <st data-num="01121" class="">descendants</st> the <st data-num="0776" class="">territory</st> on <st data-num="0834" class="">which</st> he has <st data-num="01869" class="">walked</st>, <st data-num="03282 0834">because</st> he has <st data-num="04390" class="">wholeheartedly</st> <st data-num="0310" class="">followed</st> <st data-num="03068" class="">me</st>.”<n id="2" />
As for me, the Lord was also angry with me on your account. He said, “You also will not be able to go there.

However, <st data-num="03091" class="">Joshua</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="05126" class="">Nun</st>, your <st data-num="05975 06440">assistant</st>,<n id="1" /> will <st data-num="0935 08033">go</st>. <st data-num="02388" class="">Encourage</st> him, <st data-num="03588" class="">because</st> <st data-num="01931" class="">he</st> will enable <st data-num="03478" class="">Israel</st> to <st data-num="05157" class="">inherit</st> the land.<n id="2" />

Also, your <st data-num="02945" class="">infants</st>, <st data-num="0834" class="">who</st> you <st data-num="0559" class="">thought</st> would <st data-num="0957 01961">die</st> on the way,<n id="1" /> and your <st data-num="01121" class="">children</st>, <st data-num="0834" class="">who</st> as <st data-num="03117" class="">yet</st> do <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="03045" class="">know</st> <st data-num="02896" class="">good</st> from <st data-num="07451" class="">bad</st>,<n id="2" /> will <st data-num="0935" class="">go</st> <st data-num="08033" class="">there</st>; I will <st data-num="05414" class="">give</st> them the land and <st data-num="01992" class="">they</st> will <st data-num="03423" class="">possess</st> it.
But as for you, turn back and head for the wilderness by the way to the Red Sea.”

Then you responded to me and admitted, “We have sinned against the Lord. We will now go up and fight as the Lord our God has told us to do.” So you each put on your battle gear and prepared to go up to the hill country.
But the Lord told me: “Tell them this: ‘Do not go up and fight, because I will not be with you and you will be defeated by your enemies.’”
I spoke to you, but you did not listen. Instead you rebelled against the Lord and recklessly went up to the hill country.

The <st data-num="0567" class="">Amorite</st> <st data-num="03427" class="">inhabitants</st> of <st data-num="01931" class="">that</st> <st data-num="02022" class="">area</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="03318 07125">confronted</st><n id="2" /> you and <st data-num="07291" class="">chased</st> you <st data-num="0834" class="">like</st> a swarm of <st data-num="01682" class="">bees</st>, <st data-num="03807" class="">striking</st> you <st data-num="03807" class="">down</st> from <st data-num="08165" class="">Seir</st> <st data-num="05704" class="">as far as</st> <st data-num="02767" class="">Hormah</st>.<n id="3" />
Then you came back and wept before the Lord, but he paid no attention to you whatsoever.
Therefore, you remained at Kadesh for a long time—indeed, for the full time.
